devdoc.details: SellFacet specializes in verifying conditions related to sell actions, including limit price sells, Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP) sells, and sell the rally criteria.      It ensures that the necessary conditions are met before executing sell actions.

params.account: The address of the user account that initiated the swap.
params.dex: The address of the contract or dex used for the swap.
params.fromAmount: The amount of 'fromAsset' that was swapped.
params.fromAsset: The address of the asset swapped from.
params.receivedAmount: The amount of 'toAsset' received in the swap.
params.toAsset: The address of the asset received in the swap.

params.impact: The allowable price impact percentage for the buy action.
params.investPrice: the average price at which invest tokens were bought.
params.profit: it is the profit made by the strategy.
params.rounds: the round Ids of invest and stable tokens.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy where the STR event was executed.
params.tokens: tokens substracted and added into the users wallet

params.impact: The allowable price impact percentage for the buy action.
params.investPrice: the average price at which invest tokens were bought.
params.profit: it is the profit made by the strategy.
params.stablePriceInUSD: price of stable token in USD
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy where the sell action is executed.
params.tokens: tokens substracted and added into the users wallet

params.impact: The allowable price impact percentage for the buy action.
params.investPrice: the average price at which invest tokens were bought.
params.profit: it is the profit made by the strategy.
params.stablePriceInUSD: price of stable token in USD
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy where the TWAP sell action was executed.
params.tokens: tokens substracted and added into the users wallet

params.investTokenPrice: The price of the invest token in USD.
params.stableTokenPrice: The price of the stable token in USD.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the completed strategy.

executeSTR(uint256,uint80,uint80,uint80,.details: This function performs actions based on the specified strategy parameters and market conditions to execute Sell The Rally (STR) events.      It verifies whether the strategy's parameters meet the required conditions for executing STR events.

params.fromInvestRoundId: The starting invest round ID for price data.
params.fromStableRoundId: The starting stable round ID for price data.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy to execute the STR actions for.
params.swap: The Swap struct containing address of the decentralized exchange (DEX) and calldata containing data for interacting with the DEX during the execution.
params.toInvestRoundId: The ending invest round ID for price data.
params.toStableRoundId: The ending stable round ID for price data.

executeSell(uint256,(address,bytes)).details: This function performs a sell action based on the specified strategy parameters and market conditions.      It verifies whether the strategy's parameters meet the required conditions for executing a sell.

params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy to execute the sell action for.
params.swap: The Swap struct containing address of the decentralized exchange (DEX) and calldata containing data for interacting with the DEX during the execution.

executeSellTwap(uint256,(address,bytes)).details: This function performs a TWAP sell action based on the specified strategy parameters and market conditions.      It verifies whether the strategy's parameters meet the required conditions for executing a TWAP sell.

params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy to execute the TWAP sell action for.
params.swap: The Swap struct containing address of the decentralized exchange (DEX) and calldata containing data for interacting with the DEX during the execution.

params.investValue: Boolean indicating whether the value is based on the investment amount.
params.strategyId: The unique ID of the strategy for which the sell value is calculated.

returns._0: The calculated value to be sold, which can be based on fixed or percentage units.

devdoc.title: SellFacet

AssetSwapped(address,address,address,uin.notice: Emitted when an asset swap has been executed successfully.

STRExecuted(uint256,uint256,(uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when a Spike Trigger (STR) event is executed for a trading strategy using a specific DEX and call data.

SellExecuted(uint256,uint256,(uint256,ui.notice: Emitted when a sell action is executed for a trading strategy using a specific DEX and call data.

SellTwapExecuted(uint256,uint256,(uint25.notice: Emitted when a Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP) sell action is executed for a trading strategy using a specific DEX and call data.

StrategyCompleted(uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Emitted when a trade execution strategy is completed.

executeSTR(uint256,uint80,uint80,uint80,.notice: Execute a strategy based on Spike Trigger (STR) conditions for a trading strategy.

executeSell(uint256,(address,bytes)).notice: Execute a sell action for a trading strategy.

executeSellTwap(uint256,(address,bytes)).notice: Execute a Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP) sell action for a trading strategy.

executionSellAmount(bool,uint256).notice: Calculate the value to be sold in a trading strategy based on provided parameters.

userdoc.notice: This facet contains functions responsible for evaluating conditions for executing sell actions.
